backend/main.mo: Main actor defining user profiles, posts, chat messages, test histories, access control, storage mixins, and dashboard background support with CRUD-style query/update methods.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding an empty dashboardBackground map while preserving all other fields.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented features, related source files, components, and associated requirement IDs for UI background controls and behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file providing brief descriptions of major frontend components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping dark/light theme before hydration and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router and React Query, defining routes for landing, timer, community, ncert, and test-series pages.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component applying theme class to document root and rendering nested routes with a theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/community/ChatPa: Implements a real-time group chat UI with message sending, admin deletion, auto-scroll, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/community/Commen: Displays comments for a post with authenticated adding, admin deletion, and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/components/community/ErrorB: Reusable error alert component with optional dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/community/PostCa: Shows a social post with image, caption, likes, admin moderation actions, and an embedded comments section.
frontend/src/components/community/PostCo: Form for creating a post with image upload, caption input, validation, preview, and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Allows users to upload or reset a dashboard background image with validation and auth checks.
frontend/src/components/FocusBabuLogo.ts: Clickable logo component that navigates to the home route with hover and focus effects.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity authentication with React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ncert/ChapterLis: Renders a list of NCERT chapters with buttons to view or download PDFs, or a fallback if unavailable.
frontend/src/components/ncert/SubjectCar: Displays a subject card with expandable chapter list using toggle state.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Co: Provides preset and custom color pickers to update the timer color with synchronized state.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Du: Lets users adjust focus and break durations via buttons and number inputs with validation.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Me: Displays daily session count and streak, refreshing metrics on a timed interval.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Mu: Toggles looping background music using local storage and an audio hook.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Po: Main timer component handling countdown, session transitions, audio cues, quotes, and UI controls.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Pr: Renders an SVG circular progress indicator with glow effects based on color.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/So: Provides a toggle for enabling or disabling ticking sounds during the timer.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/us: Custom hook managing Pomodoro state, durations, color, ticking, and session timing logic.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Navigation bar with route-aware highlighting and streamer mode hiding on the timer page.
frontend/src/components/SocialLinks.tsx: Displays Instagram and X social icons with size variations for header or footer.
frontend/src/components/testSeries/ExamS: Manages a timed test-taking session with navigation, answer tracking, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/testSeries/TestH: Fetches and displays user test history with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/testSeries/TestR: Shows completed test results, save status messages, and summary metrics.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggleButto: Button that switches between light and dark themes using the theme hook.
frontend/src/hooks/community/useChat.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and send chat messages with periodic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/community/useComments: Implements hooks for retrieving and adding comments tied to posts.
frontend/src/hooks/community/useModerati: Contains admin-related hooks for deleting posts, comments, messages, and blocking users.
frontend/src/hooks/community/usePosts.ts: Provides hooks to fetch, create, and like posts via actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/community/useUserProf: Fetches user profiles by principal and derives display names.
frontend/src/hooks/testSeries/useCountdo: Implements a countdown timer with start, stop, and reset controls.
frontend/src/hooks/testSeries/useTestHis: Fetches and saves test history data through actor interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actors based on Internet Identity and refreshes related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudio.ts: Provides play/pause controls and state for an HTML audio element instantiated from a source URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthState.ts: Derives authentication state and principal strings from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardBackgroun: Fetches, saves, and clears the dashboard background via backend actor with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing identity, login flow, and related context.
Syncs a React state value with localStorage for persistence across reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Handles fetching and saving user profiles via backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages dark/light theme state with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, CSS variables, Tailwind layers, and animated background effects.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Provides branding constants and helpers for app identity and copyright text.
frontend/src/lib/color.ts: Contains color utilities for converting hex to RGBA and generating glow or text-shadow effects.
frontend/src/lib/ncertData.ts: Provides structured NCERT Class 11 and 12 subject and chapter metadata.
frontend/src/lib/quotes.ts: Stores motivational quotes and returns a random one on request.
frontend/src/lib/studyMetrics.ts: Manages study session metrics using localStorage, tracking daily sessions and streaks with helper functions to update and retrieve values.
frontend/src/lib/testSeriesData.ts: Defines test series types and sample questions, and provides helpers for validating exam/category inputs and retrieving questions and durations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Displays the community feed with posts, chat, and post composer, handling authentication and layout with header and footer branding.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the landing dashboard with timer, social links, optional custom background, and global site branding.
frontend/src/pages/NcertPage.tsx: Shows NCERT book subjects for classes 11 and 12 using SubjectCard components with standard site navigation and footer.
frontend/src/pages/TestSeriesPage.tsx: Provides test series flow including test selection, running exams, computing results, and optionally saving history when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/TimerPage.tsx: Displays a standalone Pomodoro timer with streamer mode and background transparency options stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins including container queries and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing implemented features, architecture notes, and site-wide functionality for a study platform with timer, community, NCERT, and test-series pages.
